memberdef.name: AmrCore

briefdescription.para: Initialize BoxArray, DistributionMapping and data from scratch. Calling this function requires the derive class implement its own MakeNewLevelFromScratch to allocate and initialize data. Also note usually one needs to average the fine data down to coarse level after this.

memberdef.argsstring: (std::ostream &os, int min_lev, int max_lev) const noexcept
memberdef.name: printGridSummary

memberdef.argsstring: (int lev, TagBoxArray &tags, Real time, int ngrow) override=0
memberdef.name: ErrorEst

briefdescription.para: Tag cells for refinement. TagBoxArray tags is built on level lev grids.

memberdef.argsstring: (int lev, Real time, const BoxArray &ba, const DistributionMapping &dm) override=0
memberdef.name: MakeNewLevelFromScratch

detaileddescription.para: Make a new level from scratch using provided BoxArray and DistributionMapping. Only used during initialization.

memberdef.argsstring: (int lev, Real time, const BoxArray &ba, const DistributionMapping &dm)=0
memberdef.name: MakeNewLevelFromCoarse

briefdescription.para: Make a new level using provided BoxArray and DistributionMapping and fill with interpolated coarse level data.

memberdef.argsstring: (int lev, Real time, const BoxArray &ba, const DistributionMapping &dm)=0
memberdef.name: RemakeLevel

briefdescription.para: Remake an existing level using provided BoxArray and DistributionMapping and fill with existing fine and coarse data.
Provide basic functionalities to set up an AMR hierarchy.

detaileddescription.para: Because it does not own any floating point data, AmrCore used virtual functions to allocate, initialize and delete data. It also requires the derived class to tag cells for refinement.
